synonyms: gārhasthye—in household life; prabhura—of the Lord; līlā—pastimes; ādi—the original; līlā—pastimes; ākhyāna—has the name of; madhya—middle; antya—last; līlā—pastimes; śeṣa-līlāra—the last part of the pastimes; dui—two; nāma—names.
translation: The pastimes of His household life are known as ādi-līlā, or the original pastimes. His later pastimes are known as madhya-līlā and antya-līlā, or the middle and final pastimes.
